Description:
Highest Standards with Low-maintenance lifestyle so Close to Town
Built in 2012 to the highest standard is this family sized home which offers a brilliant lifestyle located just minutes to Kennington Reservoir, Strath Village Shopping precinct and Kennington Primary School.
- Three good-sized bedrooms equipped with BIRs plus master with Walk-in robe and spacious ensuite
- Three living areas include two living areas with Gas Log heating. Rumpus/study nook upstairs
- The kitchen features an impressive 1200mm wide Ceaserstone Benchtop with waterfall ends, Induction cooktop and under bench oven, spacious walk-in pantry, and top of the range Miele built-in Coffee machine
- Open plan kitchen/meals & living space looks onto the undercover entertaining area and solar heated mineral pool.
- Outdoor area with gas log fireplace and equipped for built-in BBQ facilities.
- Surrounded by low-maintenance and easy-care gardens.
Other features of the home we love;
- Built-in Sony surround sound system
- Separate Laundry with laundry shoot and drying room
- Separate powder room downstairs
- Ducted vacuuming
- Reverse cycle ducted heating and cooling
- Double garage with split system
- Double glazed windows
There isnt anything you won't love about this family home.
Inspections by private appointment only.

Description:
CAPTIVATING HOME IN PRIME LOCALE
Set on a 775m2 block in a premier Strathdale location is this quality home offering the complete family lifestyle package. The home has modern and expansive open plan living spaces, while still offering a separate second living area to retreat to - a must have in a family home. The modern kitchen offers gas cooking, loads of storage, large pantry. Sliding glass doors lead to the alfresco entertaining area and the manicured gardens beyond. Situated in a quiet street, close to local walking tracks, parks and shops and still under 5kms to the CBD, this home is truly family lifestyle perfection.

Description:
"The Centre Of Everything"!
*Due to COVID 19 I.D IS REQUIRED AS A CONDITION OF ENTRY*
This two-storey, three bedroom townhouse offers comfort to match its inner-city convenience. Entry is via the downstairs living area, with under-stair storage & easy access to the laundry & toilet. It opens to a very spacious dining & kitchen area with gas cooking & plenty of storage including a pantry. Glass doors open to a courtyard-style garden with shade and privacy & walk-through access from the single-car garage. Upstairs the three bedrooms with built-in wardrobes are just a step or two away from the three piece family bathroom with a full size bath, shower and corner vanity. The standout room has french doors opening to the decked, north-facing verandah.Walking distance to Central Bendigo, schools, shops, hospital precinct and public transport. Gas heating and ducted cooling finish off this wonderful package.This property is centrally located and ideal if you are looking for inner city low maintenance living.

Description:
ROSEDALE Circa 1928 Renovator with Subdivisional Potential
A charming three-bedroom weatherboard and roughcast Californian bungalow sitting on a 1012m2, corner allotment of Eaglehawk Road and Reserve Street.
Grand leadlight double doors lead to the wide entry with concave ceiling. Other original period features include leadlight windows, ornate ceilings, decorative cornices and hardwood timber floorboards.
- 3 bedrooms, Study and Sleepout
- 2 living areas separated by double original glass doors
- Good sized kitchen, laundry and second shower & toilet
- Attached workshop/studio plus a single garage with roller door and undercover carport
This beautiful home requires the likes of a tradie or renovator to bring it back to life or look to extend and create the dream home. With subdivisional potential (STCA) to build a second dwelling accessed off Reserve Street, whats not to love about these opportunities?
Opposite St. Liborius Primary School and walking distance to Eaglehawk township amenities and shopping, Lake Tom Thumb and Eaglehawk Health Complex.
Inspections by Private Appointment Only

Description:
FAMILY HOME ON HUGE BLOCK
APPOX 3000m2 BLOCK
3 BEDROOMS w BIRs
MAIN w SEMI ENSUITE AND CEILING FAN
LARGE LIVING ROOM w SPLIT SYSTEM
MODERN GALLEY KITCHEN
LARGE MEALS AREA
6M X 9M INDOOR ENTERTAINING AREA
6X X 12M PARKING AND WORK SHOP
CARAVAN STORAGE SHED
HOT HOUSE
BBQ ROTUNDA
WATER TANK
LOCATION
Only a 10 minutes drive to the Bendigo CBD and everything at your door step in Eaglehawk, including easy access to public transport, schools and a great life style.
FEATURES
A suburban life style with so much room to move. Imagine enjoying this huge space on the weekend with the family, a few friends, a BBQ and a fire pit, and still in the middle of Eaglehawk. The home is solid with good foundations, that offers three bedrooms with BIRs, main with semi ensuite and ceiling fan, a good size living room with split system, modern gallery kitchen, large meals area, 6m x 9m indoor fully tiled entertaining area with split system,
appox 3000m2 block, two great size sheds, hot house, orchard, BBQ rotunda and paved area at the rear of the house. The fencing at the rear of the property is iron, with gate to enter the public area which makes an easy stroll to Lake Tom Thumb.
LIFE STYLE
Only a few minutes drive to the Eaglehawk Village which provides everything you need and more. Aldi and IGA supermarkets, specialty shopping, cafes with alfresco dining, pharmacies, medical centres, leisure centre with heated pools, gym, squash and basketball courts, two beautiful lakes to walk your dog, the amazing kids play ground on the edge of the Eaglehawk lake and the Iconic Star Cinema featuring classic and modern day movies. Sporting facilities are ample, including The Eaglehawk Football & Netball Club, tennis, green bowls, crochet, and the skate park. Eaglehawk is a suburb full of history, with wonderful streetscapes, beautiful period homes and historic buildings. You will love it.

Description:
4 year old 4 bedroom family home in a great Epsom location
Nestled in the quiet and family friendly location of Tobin Crescent is this 4 and a half year old, modern brick veneer home with the lot. Packed with functional features all first home buyers or investors desire.
Hosting an attractive brown brick façade with a timber decking entrance, concrete driveway leading to a generous two car garage and side access to the backyard. Upon entry to the left you are welcomed to the master suite incorporating walk-in-robe and a three-piece ensuite. Followed by one of the two lounge rooms.
The centre of the home has an open plan living style. The large kitchen boasts stainless steel 900ml appliances, dishwasher, and a walk-in-pantry. Directly opposite you will find the large dining area and the second living space.
The remaining three bedrooms, study nook and second bathroom are situated to the left of the home from the main living area.
Features include ducted gas heating and evaporative air-conditioning throughout, double garage with remote door and internal access, alfresco off the open plan living and a large backyard full of potential.
Situated only a 3 minute drive to the Epsom Village Shopping Centre and a 2 minute drive to Jenny's early learning centre Epsom. Walking distance to the railway station and in a fantastic school catchment.
Eligible for regional Victoria's First Home Owners Grant until September this year. This property is not going to last long. Get in touch with Toby Gray to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
SEBASTIAN BUILDING BLOCK
4051m2 1 Acre 74 Main Street
Features sealed road, town water, mail delivery, council services, power at road's edge and school bus pickup. Great local community and 15 minutes to Eaglehawk. Scattered mature Ironbark and White Gum trees. Gentle elevated block. Front fence post and rail, balance of fencing incomplete wire and post. Excellent building sites, ample area to develop a quality home site, shedding or landbank. Affordable block with town features and a rural environment.

Description:
Pioneer Rise Estate - Strathfieldsaye's newly released final Stage 2 (15 Lots)
- Outstanding building block of 703m2 in great location
- Stage 2 (Final) only 15 blocks available. Stage 1 sold out very quickly.
- Strathfieldsaye's newly released sub-division offers all services and has a lovely rural outlook
- Level 1 filled areas - filling if any is compacted to achieve a similar or better density than natural ground, so no significant cost to build on the level 1 filled areas
- Pioneer Rise Estate is serviced by underground electricity, natural gas, town water, NBN ready, planning permits to build are also in place for each dwelling. All you require is your building permit
- Growing suburb of Strathfieldsaye, fabulous community with all amenities
- Location is on the corner of Ryalls Lane and Guys Hill Road, Strathfieldsaye
- Demand will be significant so call Gavin to secure a block of choice.
- BAL rating is 12.5 for Lots 27, 28, 29, 30, 31, 32, and 35 to 41. Lots 33 and 34 are a BAL rating 29.
- Information booklet on www.pioneerrise.com.au
This fabulous new sub-division only just now released offers families an opportunity to buy a lovely block in the fast growing suburb of Strathfieldsaye. A great family community where people enjoy living and take advantage all that Strathfieldsaye has to offer as well as being only minutes to the Bendigo CBD.
Note: The Status report online shows blocks as available. You need to call Gavin on 0427 887 766 to ask which blocks remain available.

Description:
Great Garden Or Developer's Delight?
Set on a whopping lot measuring approximately 1380m2, here's your rare and affordable chance to own your home and a have fantastic backyard, too! Alternatively, consider your options for subdivision and development (STCA).
With easy access to both Eaglehawk and Epsom town centres, and only a short drive to the Bendigo CBD, this large lot is position perfect for you to enjoy Bendigo's fantastic infrastructure, while still appreciating the local flora and fauna in the neighbouring bushland. Conveniently located close to bus stops and an early childhood education centre, along with schools and recreation facilities, consider raising your family with plenty of room to play.
Three bedrooms are serviced by a neat bathroom with separate toilet, oversized laundry, and large kitchen with plenty of cupboard space. Sizeable living room overlooks a backyard which comprises an undercover entertaining area, single car garage with remote door, and an additional large workshop.
Buy now as an investment, and make plans for the future to enjoy the space, embrace the flexible floorplan and generous allotment and put your own stamp on the property.

Address: 174 Wild Cherry Road Lockwood South VIC 3551
Description:
LOVELY LIFESTYLE ACREAGE OF 6.095HA (15 ACRES) JUST 25 MINUTES FROM BENDIGO
Phone enquiries - please quote property ID 23683
Set amongst the picturesque valleys of Lockwood South, 25 minutes from Bendigo, this lovely acreage property of 6.095ha (15 acres) is the perfect size as a lifestyle property or hobby farm. The area is also known for horse lovers to enjoy so could be considered for the equestrian buyer.
The land is slightly undulated, is fully fenced and gated. Also has fencing off nature reserve along seasonal creek. It has an approved building envelope ideal for your dream home or weekender. Has a 12.5 BAL rating (bush fire attack rating), sandy soil with no impediment noted by soil tests. The building envelope is clear from trees.
The property has scattered trees, which are good shading trees and has a small dam. Other information includes:-
* Power at the Gate
* Friendly Community / neighbours
* 20 minutes to Major shopping centre
* 10 minutes to primary school
* Bitumen roads
* Easy access to Calder Highway
* Just 10-15 minutes to pretty Maldon
* 1 hour 20 minutes to Melbourne airport
* Bendigo has a new airport direct to Sydney with several flights per day including Qantas.
* 1 hour 45 minutes to Melbourne CBD (property is on the Melbourne side of Bendigo.
Whether you want to grow vegetation or have some livestock, this land will be perfect. Those seeking a quiet lifestyle will very much enjoy. Everything you need is in Bendigo with major hospital, schools, university and major variety shops.
DISCLAIMER While proudly assisting home owners to sell since 1999, No Agent Property takes every care to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, but the correctness cannot be guaranteed.

Description:
COMPLETE FAMILY PACKAGE
Positioned in popular Maiden Gully opposite Pioneer Drive Reserve is this outstanding property which offers a lifestyle opportunity on a generous half acre allotment. Designed for family living the home offers 4 bedrooms plus study and 2 separate living zones. The fully-appointed central kitchen overlooks the generous entertainers deck which overlooks the landscaped and spacious rear yard. A feature of the home is the expansive master suite which serves as a parents retreat and offers a spacious en-suite and generous walk in robe.
Built for those who love to entertain this property offers a large covered outdoor area with built-in bench for casual gatherings plus a feature BBQ hut for those warm summer evenings. The fully landscaped grounds features a lined shed/garage with wood fire plus a designated fire pit area adding to your entertaining space. With town and tank water, 5KW solar system, established gardens plus your own veggie patch this property offers surprises at every turn.
Located nearby to Maiden Gully Primary School, Marist College and only a 10 minute drive to the Bendigo CBD this complete package is sure to impress.

Description:
Start Your Property Portfolio.
Add to the investment portfolio and bring in additional rental income with this North Bendigo three-bedroom opportunity.
Or invest, refresh and occupy for yourself as a first home buyer; this home has plenty of potential to make it your own comfortable retreat.
Set on an approximately 586 square metre block and close to North Bendigo Recreation Reserve, schools, day cares, amenities and a quick five-minute drive to Bendigo CBD - the location is set to delight.
Each bedroom is carpeted, offers ceiling fans and is serviced by the main bathroom and separate toilet. The master offers extra space and a walk-in robe with plenty of shelving.
The kitchen provides all the essentials, handy storage and the opportunity to add some fresh touches.
Control the climate all year round with gas heating, electric cooling and ceiling fans throughout.
Outside, paving, separate undercover entertaining area and a handy concreted workshop with plenty of storage, as well as a single carport to the side of the home with direct backyard access adds to this property's appeal.
Contact agent Jesse Forbes to request an inspection.
** COVID 19 **
This property is available to inspect by appointment only. To arrange your private viewing please contact the agent or our office on 03 5444 2526.
While attending an inspection, we request that all attendees show their ID and provide contact details before entering the property.

Description:
PREVIOUS ACCEPTED CONTRACT FELL THROUGH, ALL OFFERS WELCOME!
Motivated vendor looking to relocate as has purchased another property. Contract fell over not due to property valuation, but due to purchasers circumstances. Increased motivation to sell as now is running out of time.
Carriageways is nestled at the western side of Mt Camel. The block is north facing and has enabled the northern axis of the 3 bedroom home to benefit as it has large double glazed windows on the north and south. Polished wooden floors and extra high ceilings with attractive cornice give a feeling of openness and lightness.The home was rewired and plumbed 10 years ago. With underfloor and roof insulation this home offers easy living. You will also have no power bills as the owner has lived happily off grid for 15 years.
The 29 acres offers plenty of opportunity for the new owner. Set up using Equicentral principals the gently sloping property is double fenced, ensuring stock are always in the property. Plain wire is used through out and is easy to maintain. Set with 4 larger paddocks it is simple to create smaller cells if required. A dam of app 6mg keeps water to the stock. There is also numerous yards for horses to be locked up in or handled. For horse people it is easily accessible to Elmore Equestrian Centre.
Shedding is provided with a magnificent Girls Shed of 30x9x 7 metres that is concreted. There is 3.6 x 9m office with mezzanine. Toilet and laundry are also in the shed. There is plenty of parking for trucks or trailers here.
Rain water is collected into app 60000 litres of tanks off the house and shed.
This delightful property will offer a you the opportunity of living off grid and enjoying the pursuits that living in a rural area gives you.Toolleen Pub has great dinner, school bus leaves from Toolleen and only 17.5kms from Heathcote whilst situated in the heartland of the Heathcote Wine area.
Contact us to book your digital inspection with the agent.
(E&OE)

These units located in a quiet position in Eaglehawk will make a great addition to your investment portfolio with a great return.
